Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Mar Menuda in Tossa de Mar, you'll be on the beach and minutes from Tossa de Mar Beach and Chapel of Our Lady of Socorro. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Tossa de Mar Castle and Parish Church of Sant Vicenc.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 50 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a spa tub, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional features include concierge services and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tossa de Mar Beach - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Chapel of Our Lady of Socorro - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Tossa de Mar Castle - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Parish Church of Sant Vicenc - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Villa Romana dels Ametllers - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Municipal Museum Tossa de Mar - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Tossa de Mar Lighthouse - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Moorish Tower - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Santa Maria de Llorell Beach - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Cala Canyelles Beach - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi
Sant Joan Castle - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Sa Caleta Beach - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Puig de Castellet - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Maritime Museum - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Lloret de Mar Beach - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Mar Menuda is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 85.5 km / 53.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Best Western Hotel Mar Menuda is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 85.5 km / 53.1 mi.
